A Google Blog Post From Eric Schmidt An Update From The Chairman There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Larry Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.'' CEO of both Fiat and Chrysler.`` From a corporate governance standpoint is the point in which separate companies don't make a lot of sense.... We're not there yet.'' Sergio Marchionne said I'm not Carlos Ghosn , referring to the fact that Carlos Ghosn heads both Renault and Nissan- two automakers that have formed an alliance. Sergio Marchionne said he'd like to the see Chrysler and Fiat formally merged in two or three years

, but rivals are nipping at its heels. The Chrysler Town and Country was the top-selling minivan in the U.S. last year, with sales of 112,275, or about 4,000 more than the Honda Odyssey. We are not going to give up one inch of territory, Sergio Marchionne said. Chrysler said the 2011 versions of its minivans have a new V-6 engine with improved fuel economy. One amenity is an optional heated steering wheel, a first among minivans.- AP
